messages.subject: When there's new unschooling stuff online...
messages.msgSnippet: There are two blogs you might want to link.  They re not blogring kinds of blogs, because they re not documenting a family s days. http://sandradodd.com/blog/
messages.messageBody:
There are two blogs you might want to link. They're not blogring
kinds of blogs, because they're not documenting a family's days.


http://sandradodd.com/blog/
Announcements of news on my own site


http://unschooling.blogspot.com
Announcements of articles and news about homeschooling and
unschooling. It's a blog Laura Derrick started a few years back and
let languish. She has let Pam Sorooshian, Joyce Fetteroll and me
help her revive it. There are some new posts. You might want to
consider subscribing to it and maybe let us know if you see things we
should list. There's a link there, or you could leave a comment or
write to one of us directly.




My own blog which IS a part of the unschooling blogring, is http://
sandradodd.blogspot.com

Sandra
